name: Mimicry (Day 3: A Game a Day)
description:
Mimicry

Mimicry is a short 2D puzzle-platformer where the player controls two different colored characters (well, more like rectangles) simultaneously.

This is the 3rd game of my Game a Day challenge. I'll be making a game from scratch every single day until July 1st. To learn more about it, click this link. https://anxietymonstergames.wordpress.com/2018/06/01/a-game-a-day-blog/ 

Control
Left, Right, and Up Arrow
Left Arrow (Moves Red left and moves Blue Right)
Right Arrow (Moves Blue left and moves Red Right)
Up Arrow (Both characters Jump)

Credits

Music is from freemusicarchive
Jenifer The Game by Komiku
